title: Pu`ukoholƒÅ Heiau National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons          Pu'ukohola Heiau National Historic Site is open daily year-round 8:00am to 4:45pm (including all Federal Holidays).  The Park entrance gate closes by 4:30pm daily and all vehicles need to be out of the parking lot by 5:00pm.
